name: FitForge
description: AI-Powered Fitness Ecosystem with workout tracking, progress analytics, and community features

commands.audit: grep -r 'onClick.*undefined\|onClick.*{' client/src/ || echo 'No missing onClick handlers found'
commands.test-server: curl -s http://$(ip addr show eth0 | grep 'inet ' | awk '{print $2}' | cut -d/ -f1):5000 | head -10

button-fix: Grep for missing onClick handlers in components
Edit components to add event handlers
feature-dev: Create or update relevant module documentation
debug-session: Start dev server with npm run dev
Get WSL IP with test-server command
